issue.title: [Doc] Update the pinned sphinx version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14459](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14459). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We currently have sphinx pinned to 3.1.2 because of ARROW-9693. That compatibility issue with breathe has been solved, so we can update the sphinx version we are using (I think it is good to still keep it "pinned" at a recent version, since sphinx upgrades tend to break something from time to time).
